summary:
This mod adds a marvelous open cathedral in the Rift just south of the Atronach stone, on a hilltop. There will be a series of keys to find in order to explore the cathedral.
Is not lore friendly. No navmesh.
This mod is simply for aesthetics and just the fun of having an open interior.
descriptionHtml:
The cathedral is located in the Rift, south of the Atronach Stone, on a hilltop. A map marker called "Skyrim Cathedral" has been added.

To venture atop the cathedral and open the treasury chest, you must explore the cathedral and find the right key to open the right gate. It is not a puzzle, but simply a way to make you explore an open interior vertically.

Watch your step. Fall damage is ruthless in Skyrim.

Only vanilla meshes were used.
The high amount of objects might recude your FPS. Please use a strong computer.
The mod is not lore friendly. I was sick of seeing the great buildings of Skyrim having no matching interiors.
I did not create the navmesh because that is beyond my modding capacity.

Have fun climbing up the spire.

Pierrick
author: Pierrick
